changeSet.author: ravi
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO question (question_id, question_text) VALUES (100, 'Who wrote Ramayana?'), (101, 'Who is the father Lord Rama?'), (102, 'Who is the brother of Vali in Ramayana?'), (103, 'Who is the father of Bhishma?'), (104, 'Who is the gatekeeper of Lanka in Ramayana?'), (105, 'In which garden was Sita held in captivity in Lanka?'), (106, 'Who was the first prime minister of India?'), (107, 'Who was the first president of India?'), (108, 'What is the capital city of India?'), (109, 'Who wrote Indian national anthem?'), (110, 'What is the full name of Mahatma Gandhi?');
INSERT INTO option (option_id, question_id, option_text, is_correct) VALUES (100, 100, 'Valmiki', 'T'), (101, 100, 'Vyasa', 'F'), (102, 100, 'Kalidasa', 'F'), (103, 100, 'Bhasa', 'F'), (104, 101, 'Dasaratha', 'T'), (105, 101, 'Janaka', 'F'), (106, 101, 'Viswamitra', 'F'), (107, 101, 'Bharata', 'F'), (108, 102, 'Sugriva', 'T'), (109, 102, 'Hanuman', 'F'), (110, 102, 'Angada', 'F'), (111, 102, 'Jambavan', 'F'), (112, 103, 'Santanu', 'T'), (113, 103, 'Bharata', 'F'), (114, 103, 'Kanva', 'F'), (115, 103, 'Dushyanta', 'F'), (116, 104, 'Lankini', 'T'), (117, 104, 'Tataki', 'F'), (118, 104, 'Simhika', 'F'), (119, 104, 'Surasa', 'F'), (120, 105, 'Ashoka Vanam', 'T'), (121, 105, 'Pushpa Vanam', 'F'), (122, 105, 'Badarika Vanam', 'F'), (123, 105, 'Nandana Vanam', 'F'), (124, 106, 'Jawaharlal Nehru', 'T'), (125, 106, 'Babu Rajendra Prasad', 'F'), (126, 106, 'Vallabhai Patel', 'F'), (127, 106, 'Indira Gandhi', 'F'), (128, 107, 'Jawaharlal Nehru', 'F'), (129, 107, 'Babu Rajendra Prasad', 'T'), (130, 107, 'Vallabhai Patel', 'F'), (131, 107, 'Indira Gandhi', 'F'), (132, 108, 'New Delhi', 'T'), (133, 108, 'Mumbai', 'F'), (134, 108, 'Kolkata', 'F'), (135, 108, 'Hyderabad', 'F'), (136, 109, 'Rabindra Nath Tagore', 'T'), (137, 109, 'Bankim Chandra Chatterji', 'F'), (138, 109, 'Mahatma Gandhi', 'F'), (139, 109, 'Sarojini Naidu', 'F'), (140, 110, 'Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi', 'T'), (141, 110, 'Mohandas Kushalchand Gandhi', 'F'), (142, 110, 'Muralidas Karamchand Gandhi', 'F'), (143, 110, 'Motilal Karamchand Gandhi', 'F');
